title: Firefox crashing constantly
content:
Dear all,

For some time now my Firefox browser is crashing while I use it. Then a loop starts where a window appear with buttons offering to Restart or Close Firefox but whichever I choose it takes several sets of open/crash to stabilize when in the end if offers to either open it again, or refresh Firefox. I don't wan to refresh because I have tens of tabs that I want to save. But I can't because OneTab, along with all other extensions, is being disabled after the restarts.

I have a crash ID of one of the latest occurrences of this phenomena: f6ef62ad-b072-46b8-8bc8-0d3ca0240708

Please advise!
creator: radi.stoyanov

title: video
content:
I subscribed to an educational series that includes several kinds of presentation, including MP3, PDF, and video. The videos do not work. Not at all. I was directed to try a different browser, which I did: microsoft edge. The videos play using that browser.

I MUCH prefer to use Firefox -- do not like anything microsoft, but here we are, trapped in bill gates' monopoly.

I looked at "settings" but was not able to see anything there I thought would allow these videos to play in firefox. Be advised, I am NOT a computer person, so anything you might suggest, please be very literal, specific and define any acronyms -- do not assume I know anything about this stuff, because I don't -- I do not speak computer.

Again, I MUCH prefer to use firefox so I am hoping you can help me to watch these videos in firefox. The website is Goodness Lover (weird name, I know) it deals with diet, microbiome research etc.

thank you, Rick McBride wopela@earthlink.net
creator: wopela

title: Enable light theme on "header" for disability users for Private browsing windows?
content:
I'm old, so having the "header" in my Private Search bar be in dark mode is very difficult. I've done searches on the subject and noted there are other people with visual challenges with the same issue.

I tried to go to Settings to change it, but it wouldn't let me change from "automatic" to "light mode". It was blocked!

Please help as I really, really prefer to do private searches for items relating to my medical issued. It is tough enough to be old, I don't need the whole internet gawking at searches for adult diapers, etc.

Thanks Haze Kompelin
creator: HazeKomp

title: go back one page shortcut
content:
Hi there! How can I delete the "go back one page shortcut"? Every time I side-scroll while holding option I go back and this is interfering with another web-app.

Thanks!

Adrian.
creator: Adrian_1

title: Primair email adrs bestaat niet meer
content:
Hallo,

Van mijn account a.h.joostgema@tele2.nl bestaat het primair mailadres niet meer. Ik kan dus nieuwe apparaten niet meer synchroniseren. Kan mijn emailadress arjenjoostema@gmail.com adres er aan gekoppeld worden?

Groet, Arjen Joostema
creator: arjenjoostema

title: opening page. cannot use main toolbar in centre
content: When Firefox opens up the address is typed in at top left in small print. The center bar is there, open, but if you click on it, while the cursor blinks, when you type in an address nothing appears as it does with Google Chrome which we have replaced with Firefox. My wife finds the top left print too small and wants me to go back to Google Chrome where she can read what she has entered. I cannot find anything, anywhere which will allow her to do this. We use Thunderbird and have made a few donations over the years. Hope you can help.
creator: pwhite33

title: Toggling the Left shift key opens and closes the Bookmarks tab in firefox.
content: Toggling the left Shift key opens and closes the bookmarks tab on the left side of screen. Its very annoying when wanting typing capitals. Also the left Alt button opens the media player. Both these started doing so by themselves. The right buttons of these keys operate as normal. How to turn these off.
creator: lcollodetti

title: Bank ID app
content:
Hello. The Bank ID app does not work on Firefox, it is not possible to log in to e.g. DNB

title: Problemi audio con ultimo Aggiornamento Firefox su MacOS
content: Salve, dopo l'ultimo aggiornamento (127.0.2) su sistema operativo OSX 13.6.7 ho riscontrato problemi con l'uscita audio del Browser. Il mio convertitore Audio Ã¨ impostato per avere l'uscita audio di default su Output 31-32 (cosi impostato anche sul sistema). Fino all'ultimo aggiornamento l'audio seguiva regolarmente le impostazioni del sistema operativo, mentre ora Firefox forza le uscite su Output 1-2. Come posso risolvere il problema?
creator: gianlucasiscaro

title: Right click context
content:
Help on stopping my Right-click-context of "Search Google for..." from doing a search on Yahoo?

Version 127.0.2 Windows 11
creator: liar409

title: For the last couple of weeks after logging into Instagram or Facebook or Disney+ or Paramount+ or X I get an email from them that says I logged in from a device I don't usually use. Really annoying and also concerning. Can I fix this somehow?
content: I don't know why or if it's related to Firefox, but For the last couple of weeks after logging into Instagram or Facebook or Disney+ or Paramount+ or X I get an email from them that says I logged in from a device I don't usually use. I have had the same device for several years. Getting those emails is annoying and also concerning. Can I fix this somehow? FYI I use Duck Duck Go via Firefox for my internet searches.
creator: chktur

title: How to export bookmarks (and history, if possible)
content:
I just got this new computer and want to transfer my FireFox bookmarks and history to it. I cannot access my old account because I do not have access to that email anymore, and you require me to get a code sent to that email to log in. That is still on my old computer that was originally running Windows 8, and has been deteriorating ever since Microsoft jammed Windows 10 down it's throat.

I might still be able to export the bookmarks if there is some way to do that.

The best way would be if I could access to that old account without needing to access bonin006@umn.edu my current email is wayne@nano-dyne.com

Please see if there is a way to help me.

Thanks, Wayne Bonin
creator: bonin006

title: Updates disabled by your system administrator - cannot update since v122.0.1 MAC
content:
Have a macbook pro. Have not updated firefox in a while due to this message I get when i go to "about firefox" "Updates disabled by your system administrator" This is my personal laptop for the last few years, nobody has ever used it. I AM the administrator. Many posts online about this message for windows and linux but cannot find a fix for Mac, or why this is happening.

How do i update please? Having a lot of latency issues of late so need to update.
creator: Glacier
